description: Developed and maintained full-stack web applications using Node.js, Express, TypeScript, and React.
Built and optimized RESTful APIs with Express; implemented secure authentication using JWT and Auth0.
Improved application performance by integrating Elasticsearch, reducing data retrieval time by 40%.
Created scalable RESTful APIs with Express, secured using JWT and Auth0.
Created scalable RESTful APIs with Express, secured using JWT and Auth0.
Built a full-stack To-Do application using React, Node.js, Express, and MySQL during training; practiced REST API development and authentication.
Contributed to a production-level feature in an enterprise app using Java Spring Boot and MySQL, collaborating with the backend team in Agile sprints.
